text.en: Noble Tārā, Mother who Brings Liberation,
Wish-Fulfilling Wheel, extender of life,
Divine lady, I pray to you:
Protect me from life-threatening obstacles
text.en-trans: dak gi tsé yi barché dang

text.en: And all forms of sickness and sorrow!
Protect me, O powerful one, I pray,
text.en-trans: nüden khyö kyi kyab tu sol

text.en: Grant the supreme and common siddhis,
Each and every single one!
Noble lady, you always look upon those
With faith in you as your own children.
text.en-trans: dé la taktu bu zhin gong

text.en: Now, as I too appeal to you in prayer,
text.en-trans: dak kyang khyö la soldeb kyi

text.en: Catch me with your hook of compassion.
Goddess of moon-coloured form,
Elegant and graceful in dress,
Beautiful, with jewelled ornaments,
And attractive lower garment of silk,
Seated at the heart of a lotus and moon disc
With two legs crossed in vajra posture,
Smiling, with one face and two hands,
text.en-trans: zhal chik chak nyi dzum bakchen

text.en: Goddess, mother of the buddhas of the three times,
To you I bow down eternally in homage!
Through this praise of you, however limited,
text.en-trans: khyé la cha tsam töpa yi

text.en: For me and all who strive toward awakening,
From this moment forth, until we reach the goal,
text.en-trans: dü di né zung changchub bar

text.en: Let unfavourable circumstances be pacified
And favourable conditions abound!
